sources.description: The institutional authority for all extreme metal genres, known for high-quality reviews and 'Best New Noise' features.
The definitive source for roots music coverage, specializing in narrative depth and critical analysis of Americana and alt-country.
Major publication covering hard rock, metal, and the contemporary crossover hardcore scene with high production value.
Institutional analysis of the alternative canon; high Critical Depth and Tech Feasibility, making it an essential data source.
Cross-genre review site with a blend of professional editorial and community critique, highly suitable for agentic extraction.

sources.genre_focus: Rock, Metal, Prog (Metal Hammer, Classic Rock)
sources.description: UK portal and online home for major magazines like Metal Hammer, focusing on established rock, metal, and progressive genres.
Long-standing and well-respected alternative music outlet, particularly strong in UK indie and experimental scenes.
A trusted source with a vast database and high Longevity, offering detailed reviews and cataloging across all genres.
Pioneering metal journalism since 2000, known for its extensive archive of metal history and current reviews.
Broad coverage site with strong roots in alternative and indie rock; generally provides high-quality coverage.

sources.genre_focus: Alternative Rock, Punk, Pop Punk, Metal
sources.description: Promotional platform focusing on rising stars in the alternative sphere, offering reviews and news on emerging bands.
One of the largest metal news platforms, focusing primarily on high-volume news and updates for mainstream and major underground acts.
Leading source for up-to-the-minute news, interviews, and updates in rock and metal; good for tracking big releases.
Community-driven platform for user ratings and reviews, valuable for tracking niche audience sentiment and genre discovery.
Aggregates reviews from top critics, providing a consolidated Metascore; best used as a diagnostic tool rather than a primary review source.
Top analytical metal blog since 2009, known for brutally honest and exceptionally rigorous critiques across all metal subgenres.
Specializes in underground, sludge, doom, and experimental metal; essential for boundary-pushing heavy music.
Focused on deep, analytical critique of complex, structural genres like Post-Rock and Progressive Metal.
Review section of the influential non-commercial radio station, providing eclectic, high-quality critique on Art Rock and unique artists.
The absolute authority for underground punk legitimacy, known for its anti-major label policy and manual-style reviews.
Foundational collective/zine for anarcho-punk and crust since 1989, focused on the ideological core of the punk movement.
Excellent high-quality archival and niche curation for psych, esoteric folk, and garage rock.
Specialized metal blog known for its critical depth and often humorous, unsparing approach to metal reviews.
Specialized UK-based heavy music portal covering extreme metal, hardcore, and associated heavy genres.
Independent journal that often covers Art Rock and eclectic artists, with a strong focus on high artistic merit.
Independent promotional platform focusing on newer acts in the alternative and pop-punk space.
Niche review blog dedicated specifically to garage and psychedelic rock.
Focuses on the underground movement, spanning punk, hardcore, gothic, and psychobilly genres.
High cultural cachet in the indie sphere, known for curating eclectic and often hype-driven indie music.
Focuses heavily on independent and unsigned music, providing a platform for emerging talent.
